home.heroSubtitle: Family-run accommodation in the Ore Mountains area. Capacity 10 guests, calm atmosphere.
home.introText: Pension by the Church is a family guesthouse in Litvínov (Kostelní 35) with capacity up to 10 guests. Cozy accommodation in the city centre, just 50 m from Míru Square.

about.title: About the Pension
about.text1: The historic house in Kostelní street has been carefully renovated and offers four comfortable double rooms with extra bed option.
about.equip: Room amenities: private bathroom, TV, wired/Wi‑Fi internet, storage.
about.shared: Shared areas: fully equipped kitchen with dining room, common staircase, utility rooms.
about.location: Advantages: central location (50 m from Míru Square) and peaceful surroundings.

rooms.title: Rooms & Prices
rooms.subtitle: Four double rooms with optional extra beds. Triple arrangement available.
rooms.doubleDesc: Comfortable room for 2 guests, extra bed available.
rooms.tripleDesc: Room with extra bed for 3 guests.
rooms.longStay: VAT included in the listed prices. Individual pricing for long-term stays – contact us.

surroundings.text: Litvínov and the Ore Mountains offer excellent options for hiking, cycling and winter sports.

tips.hiking: Hiking: Ore Mountains ridges, viewpoints and nature trails.

tips.ski: Skiing: nearby ski resorts and cross-country trails.
